name: Chess Game
description: An interactive platform for players to enjoy multiplayer chess games, featuring real-time gameplay and smooth WebSocket integration.

name: StudyNotion
description: StudyNotion is a scalable educational platform with dynamic ReactJs interfaces, MongoDB storage, and seamless collaboration features.

name: NetflixGPT
description: NetflixGPT is a React-based movie discovery app with Firebase authentication, offering personalized recommendations and detailed movie info.

name: VSCode Portfolio
description: A themeable and developer-centric portfolio based on the VSCode

name: YouTube Clone
description: YouTube Clone is a React app with Redux for state management and Tailwind CSS for responsive design, supporting 1080p video playback and user authentication for over 1,000 users.
